name: Pursue the Horizon
description:
The tale

A brave little boy, with an even braver narrator, go on an epic journey. 

Beyond their boundaries, and even beyond the horizon! 

... 

Well, at least they try to do so.

Instructions

Movement - WASD

Skip dialogue - Enter or Left shift

Interaction and action - Left click
